work-item.field:
We want to create a report which displays all requirements and their linked test cases but lets start with a table of our requirements.
  • Create new wiki page "[YOUR NAME] Traceability report"
    • Use $trackerService to query all requirements in current project sorted by "id" and save result in $requirements
    • Create HTML table
      • Use a foreach loop to get each single requirement
      • Use {workitem} macro to display each requirement inside of a table cell [remember you need the id (string) of a work item not the object itself inside this macro]
        • We want to display only the title of a workitem.
        • The workitem shouldn´t be expanded
